nav.footp: The Spanish word for trust, which is our main expression both internally and externally.

home.herop2: We connect people with great companies.
home.herop3: The future workplace will rely on soft skills.
home.servp: We believe that highlighting soft skills at work creates a better environment for everyone. When recruiting, we want to get to know the person behind the CV. We see the potential in the future employee.
home.serv1p: When it's time to look for a new team member, it might not always be clear what you're exactly looking for. We help you set up the recruitment process, specify what we are looking for and start the hunt for your next employee! At Confiar, we will always deliver relevant candidates for the position.
home.serv2p: When it's time to recruit several positions, it might be difficult to know where and how to start. This is when we step in and support your organization and are your sidekick through the entire process. We look into your current process & employee branding and make some changes together if needed.
home.serv3p: As a manager it might be difficult to find the time for your new employees. A good onboard experience will make your new employees to feel more welcomed, satisfied and comfortable with their new position.  We support you with this during the first 6 months. This service is free of charge.
home.serv4p1: Are you looking for a new job and need some coaching for the job you really want to have? We will help you! We support different people in your situation every week, don't hesitate to ask us.
home.serv4p2: Are you a consultancy company and want support in coaching your employees? We are happy to help you! The feedback we get from candidates is so nice to hear or read, make sure your employees are well prepared.
home.feat1p: We believe soft skills is the core of a healthy work environment and successful business.
home.feat2p: We believe that through transparency you increase the commitment and trustworthiness of all involved parties.
home.feat3p: We stand for diversity in the workplace as we believe it stimulates creativity and builds a better and more respectful workplace.
home.feat4p: We have engineering background in the automotive industry, sales and consultancy. The heart beats for people management.
home.tes1: I can highly recommend Alexandra and the team at Confiar who have helped recently recruit two staff members for me. They were very sensitive positions to fill and on both occasions they provided a high calibre of candidates and were very accurate in ensuring they were the right fit for what I was looking for. Their process from start to finish is delivered in a professional but personable manner, every step of the way.

jobs.p1: Can't find what you’re looking for?
jobs.p2: Join our network and submit your resume. We’ll reach out if we have a great match.

candidates.p2: We connect you with people first companies
candidates.hp1: Looking for the perfect job can be time consuming and you will have a lot of questions about the employer before you accept an offer.
candidates.hp2: By going through our recruitment company, you get a chance to get to know more exciting companies within your area. We talk about the soft skills and what would be interesting for you. By signing up as a candidate at Confiar, you will get personal contact with us, and will only get jobs suggestions based on your own interest, knowledge and experience.
candidates.li1p: Every employee should feel respected and that your future employee cares for you individually.
candidates.li2p: Respect for the candidate and the client privacy
candidates.li3p: Listening to your requirements to provide the greatest service
candidates.whyp1: We are a small recruitment agency with tech experience and we believe we are good with people. We want to get to know you behind your CV, let's get to know each other, maybe starting with a coffee?
candidates.whyp2: We are always happy to connect.
candidates.signp: When you register as a candidate at Confiar, you will personally be offered jobs that are suitable for your background and interest. Our recruitment process will make you feel comfortable when you get the position due to the services we offer the company. These services are developed to make sure that both you as a candidate and the client are satisfied when the process is finished.

companies.2: Looking for a new team member?
companies.3: We will help you find your next employee!
companies.9: The engineering industry is in a developing and expansive phase where incredibly rapid changes are taking place all the time, where commitment is crucial for the organization's effectiveness. This, we believe, is based on
companies.12: We want to help you be the employer of choice, we want your company culture to be reflected throughout the entire recruitment process.
companies.13: By choosing Confiar, you get a personalized, full-coverage solution for your recruitment process, where we focus on not only the right candidate but the company culture and team dynamic. The future workplace is chosen by soft values and our goal is to provide both the candidate and client with the necessary information and tools to deliver a high quality experience.
companies.18: We always deliver a number of qualified candidates according to the agreed profile
companies.20: If you for some reason don't prolong the new team members contract within 3 months we will start a new recruitment free of charge.
companies.21: We are a small recruitment agency with engineering background and we believe we are good with people. We want to get to know your company culture and teammembers, maybe starting with a coffee?
companies.22: We are always happy to connect.
companies.26: By focusing on customized solutions, we can offer a personal service where both customer and candidate are in focus. We work with the entire recruitment process but also supports you with parts in the process if that is what you prefer. We always start by having an introductory meeting where we get to know your company culture, team and leaders.
companies.28: We want to help you in the best way to get the most out of your time
companies.29: Do you have a challenge finding new employees? As an external Tech recruitment company, we contribute with another point of view and reach out to a wider target group where we work together as effectively as possible to find the next employee that fits into your team and work culture.
companies.31: Do you need reinforcement when recruiting new employees?
companies.33: Are you a smaller company where you are unable to hire a recruiter yet? No problem, we will support you from a few hours a week to full time. It's all up to you! Are you a bigger company wanting to expand your recruitment team? We are open to different setups.
companies.36: A good onboarding experience is crucial for the new employee to feel welcome, satisfied and comfortable in their new workplace. We know that it can be a challenge as a recruiting manager to give enough time to new employees, that's why we are happy to support you during the first 6 months. Onboarding is a service that you, the customer, can choose to use completely free of charge.
companies.39: By outsourcing the recruitment, you get the advantages like saving time, experienced support at the same time as you get to specify your company's needs. You will also have the option to find your next future employee.
companies.41: We go through your current recruitment process, see if there is something we can make more effective and together make sure that you have an efficient, measurable and great recruitment process.
companies.43: Presentation of your company, the team och the position
companies.44: Second interview with the Recruitment Manager/Technical Manager
companies.47: Technical reference, Personal reference, Identify strengths & weaknesses (Technical test if agreed)
companies.51: Is a modern recruitment agency with high experience within recruitment. By choosing Confiar, you get a full-coverage solution for your recruitment process within IT, tech and sales. We always make sure that the candidate we provide you with fulfills your requirements. The future working place will be selected by soft values. Here will we be able to affect and will do that from the start due to our recruitment process. Our goal is to provide both the candidate and client with the necessary information and tools to deliver a top experience

about.1: Curious to know who we are?
about.2: We are a small and personal recruitment company with experience in engineering, IT, Technology and Sales. During our first years in the engineering industry, we felt that something was missing in the workplace,
about.4: Trust and transparency are values we strongly work for, both internally and externally, this is how we believe you create long-term relationships. Apart from the fact that we love recruitment, we have a great passion for technology and entrepreneurship.
about.5: Our vision is that together with our partners work for a more including and open recruitment process where trust and soft values are in focus. Confiar means trust in Spanish and is exactly what we stand for both internally and externally.
about.8: I am passionate about an equal workplace, strongly believe in soft values and as a person I am an open, communicative and positive person that loves to meet new people. When not working I practice yoga, go for a run or take morning walks. If I am on vacation, you will find me in a retreat or exploring a new place.
about.9: I have a background as a product engineer in the automotive industry but also worked as a business manager and group manager. My strength and competence is in the recruitment process and have now decided to go full-heartedly into recruitment where my strength is my experience and background in Tech.
about.11: I started working with sales in high school and totally love it, why? Sales for me is not about revenue, it's about meeting new people and hearing different life stories.
about.12: When I'm not working at Confiar, you find me studying in the library at Lindholmen. I am currently studying mechanical engineering at Chalmers University. I am often the first contact with the candidates but I will always be a part of the recruitment process. During weekends you find me playing tennis tournaments or at the gym.
about.14: We are waiting for you, lets start a new human adventure.

contact.5: There seems to be an issue with our contact form. Please email us directly.
contact.7: Thanks for contacting Confiar! One of our recruiters will be in contact with you shortly.

dashboard.3: This information will be used to apply for jobs.

join.2: You can register for an account in order to edit/update your profile and CV in future and have the ability to one click apply to different jobs.
join.22: Something you want to share about yourself?
join.24: I've read and agreed to Confiar's
join.35: One of our recruiters will be in contact with you soon.

login.4: Enter your email and we'll email you a magic link for a password-free sign in.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.titleP1: At Confiar, accessible from Confiar.se, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Confiar and how we use it.
privacy.titleP2: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
privacy.titleP3: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Confiar. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
privacy.consentP1: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
privacy.collectP1: The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.
privacy.collectP2: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.
privacy.collectP3: When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.
privacy.useP1: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
privacy.useLi1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
privacy.useLi2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
privacy.useLi3: Understand and analyze how you use our website
privacy.useLi4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
privacy.useLi5: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes
privacy.logP1: Confiar follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.
privacy.cookieP1: Like any other website, Confiar uses 'cookies'. These cookies are used to store information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors' browser type and/or other information.
privacy.googleP1: Google is one of a third-party vendor on our site. It also uses cookies, known as DART cookies, to serve ads to our site visitors based upon their visit to www.Confiar.se and other sites on the internet. However, visitors may choose to decline the use of DART cookies by visiting the Google ad and content network Privacy Policy at the following URL
privacy.adsP1: Some of advertisers on our site may use cookies and web beacons. Our advertising partners are listed below. Each of our advertising partners has their own Privacy Policy for their policies on user data. For easier access, we hyperlinked to their Privacy Policies below.
privacy.adsPrivacyP1: You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of Confiar.
privacy.adsPrivacyP2: Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on Confiar, which are sent directly to users' browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit.
privacy.adsPrivacyP3: Note that Confiar has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.
privacy.thirdP1: Confiar's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.
privacy.thirdP2: You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites.
privacy.ccpa: CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
privacy.ccpaP1: Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:
privacy.ccpaP2: Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
privacy.ccpaP3: Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
privacy.ccpaP4: Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.
privacy.ccpaP5: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
privacy.gdprP1: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
privacy.gdprP2: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
privacy.gdprP3: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
privacy.gdprP4: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacy.gdprP5: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacy.gdprP6: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacy.gdprP7: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
privacy.gdprP8: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
privacy.kidsP1: Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.
privacy.kidsP2: Confiar does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
